languages.text: [Крепко взять за руку] "Я разрешаю тебе быть уязвимым, когда я рядом. Если понадобится, я сам{mf||а} тебя защищу".
[Tightly grip his hand] "I permit you to be vulnerable with me. If necessary, I will protect you myself."
languages.original_text: [Крепко взять за руку] "Я разрешаю тебе быть уязвимым, когда я рядом. Если понадобится, я сам{mf||а} тебя защищу".

traits.locale_text: [Tightly grip his hand] "I permit you to be vulnerable with me. If necessary, I will protect you myself."
[Tightly grip his hand] "I permit you to be vulnerable with me. If necessary, I will protect you myself."
[Tightly grip his hand] "I permit you to be vulnerable with me. If necessary, I will protect you myself."
[Tightly grip his hand] "I permit you to be vulnerable with me. If necessary, I will protect you myself."
[Tightly grip his hand] "I permit you to be vulnerable with me. If necessary, I will protect you myself."

languages.text: [Lui serrer fermement la main] « Je vous permets d'être vulnérable avec moi. Si nécessaire, je vous protégerai moi-même. »
languages.original_text: [Tightly grip his hand] "I permit you to be vulnerable with me. If necessary, I will protect you myself."

traits.locale_text: [Lui serrer fermement la main] « Je vous permets d'être vulnérable avec moi. Si nécessaire, je vous protégerai moi-même. »

languages.text: [彼の手を強く握る]「{mf|俺|私}の前では弱さを見せてもいい。いざとなったら、{mf|俺|私}が君を守る」
languages.original_text: [Tightly grip his hand] "I permit you to be vulnerable with me. If necessary, I will protect you myself."

traits.locale_text: [彼の手を強く握る]「{mf|俺|私}の前では弱さを見せてもいい。いざとなったら、{mf|俺|私}が君を守る」

languages.text: [Agarrarle fuertemente de la mano] «Tiene permiso para ser vulnerable ante mí. Si es necesario, le protegeré personalmente».
languages.original_text: [Tightly grip his hand] "I permit you to be vulnerable with me. If necessary, I will protect you myself."

traits.locale_text: [Agarrarle fuertemente de la mano] «Tiene permiso para ser vulnerable ante mí. Si es necesario, le protegeré personalmente».

languages.text: [紧紧握住他的手]“我允许你在我面前展现你脆弱的一面。如果有必要的话，我会亲自保护你。”
languages.original_text: [Tightly grip his hand] "I permit you to be vulnerable with me. If necessary, I will protect you myself."

traits.locale_text: [紧紧握住他的手]“我允许你在我面前展现你脆弱的一面。如果有必要的话，我会亲自保护你。”

languages.text: [Elini sıkıca tut] "Benim yanımda savunmasız olmana izin veriyorum. Gerekirse seni korurum."
languages.original_text: [Tightly grip his hand] "I permit you to be vulnerable with me. If necessary, I will protect you myself."

traits.locale_text: [Elini sıkıca tut] "Benim yanımda savunmasız olmana izin veriyorum. Gerekirse seni ben korurum."

languages.text: [Seine Hand halten] "Ich gestatte Euch, in meiner Gegenwart verwundbar zu sein. Falls nötig, werde ich Euch beschützen."
languages.original_text: [Tightly grip his hand] "I permit you to be vulnerable with me. If necessary, I will protect you myself."

traits.locale_text: [Seine Hand halten] "Ich gestatte Euch, in meiner Gegenwart verwundbar zu sein. Falls nötig, werde ich Euch beschützen."
